text: Philip Argyres is an American physicist and professor at the University of Cincinnati. He is an Elected Fellow of the American Physical Society and a member of Simons Foundation. ==References== ==External links== * Category:Living people Category:University of Cincinnati faculty Category:Fellows of the American Physical Society Category:21st-century American physicists Category:Year of birth missing (living people) Category:Place of birth missing (living people)
title: Philip Argyres
